name: NeverHaveIEver
0:
”Alexa, start Never Have I Ever.”
”Alexa, ask Never Have I Ever what to do.”
”Alexa, ask Never Have I Ever for next sentence.”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: never have i ever
des:
This game is going to be more and more fun while playing it.
There are plenty of questions which are starting from being harmless to intimate things you maybe wanted to know about your friends.

But be aware that they will also find out things about you they may not have known yet.

Here are the rules:
Alexa will point out a sentence into the room when saying: "Alexa, start Never Have I Ever".

If you have ever done what was pointed out as a sentence then you'll have to drink or whatever you play for.

Everyone who never has done what has been pointed out does not have to drink or whatever you play for and is so spared.

Here are a few commands you can use to play this game:
"Alexa, start Never Have I Ever" - to start the game or hear the next sentence
"Alexa, ask Never Have I Ever for restart game" - use this to start a completly restart the game to hear sentences you have heard before
"Alexa, ask Never Have I Ever what to do" - this way you'll be notices which commands you can use

We hope you enjoy this game!

Thank you for your time and have much fun!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
